item.description: Hey Everyone, I thought it would be fun to go see a hockey game at Boston University. On Friday, January 18 the Boston University Terriers are playing the Northeastern Husky's. We can get a special group rate of $15 for tickets. You must pay in advance using PayPal. All seats will be together and you can pick up your tickets from Will Call. This is a family friendly event. Should a fun night of hockey. Hope you can make it. Andrew
item.how_to_find_us: Pick up tickets from Will Call

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Hockey Night in Boston
